description: A high-damage and flexible build with reliable combos.
author: Chappll - Tribute to Vinn

description: Very tanky consistant damage with good phys/spell damage
author: ChipSa

description: High mobility, very dynamic and hard to catch
author: Hotbiscuit

description: A very high damage offensive spell casting build focusing on kiting. Mandatory jewels are the knockback jewel on volley and the knockback jewel on frost barrier. Hits on your frost shield will serve to only increase your volley damage and volley damage will trigger ignite that gives you even more movement speed through Draculin blood. Moderate weapon damage can be achieved with stats on weapons and if you run into trouble, the increased shapeshift speed will get you out of wherever you are faster than anyone else. Option to take agonizing flames for the heal, take the other chaos passive to give you the 8% increased damage and heal.
author: Bardo

description: A build that enables daggers as a solo weapon with no weapon swaps. Perfect with the artifact weapon wraith blades it aims to stack high phantasm quickly and throw dagger Qs as often as possible. With rogue blood, dash can be used to make Qs always crit. More defensive alternatives to curse are chaos barrier, frost barrier or lightning curtain.
author: Chappll

description: Tank build that is unmatched in close range. Sponges damage with high shielding and hits through defensives for high damage with artic storm. Artic storm can be interrupted at the end of the cast to remove the risk of triggering defensives.
author: ChipSa

description: Reliable Long range poke using lightning tendrils that has a range jewel. Potential for high burst through skeleton bombs and lightning tendril stuns. Grim set should be taken to avoid overcapping spell power.
author: Chappll

description: Combo heavy build but with a fast and good neutral game. High damage and survivability.
author: CountDickula

description: Combo heavy build with a slow neutral game. Bad at ranged fighting. Good sustain and defensive capabilities.
author: CountDickula

description: Slow neutral game with very long cc chains and a few combos attached. Bad at ranged fighting and against multiple defensive users.
author: CountDickula

description: Uses Vampire curse jewel on shadowbolt. Skillshot heavy. Good sustain and damage. Needs frost infused weapons and/or frost coatings to be playable.
author: CountDickula

description: High damaging combo build. Atrocious neutral game, very bad at ranged fighting.
Very mobile ranged build. Lacks high burst damage, good at escaping attackers.
Exceptionally strong neutral game, very good at ranged and close combat, highly mobile. Lacks burst damage. Alternative ults heart strike or crimson beam.
author: CountDickula

description: Slow neutral game, control based, good at ranged combat. Has high burst when committing to a combo. Good at teamfights.
Very strong control based neutral game. Exceptional at long ranged combat. Lacks burst damage. Alternative Ult Crimson Beam.
author: CountDickula

description: A very powerful build with a lot of explosions and healing.
author: Pancake
content: Best when in a group, weaker in solo open world

description: A build that takes full advantage of corruptions ghosts, using sanguine coils multiple charges to maximise corruption ghost summons which can then be used to proc your own bloodrites.
author: Chappll

description: Based around big shields and good anti defensive poke
author: Hotbiscuit

description: Spam Whip and Longbow
author: Hotbiscuit

description: An aggro build that enables claws to be used alone without weapon swaps to maxmise its value from rupture. Soulburn is very important to keep defensives in check and compliments the melee style of play. Counter can be changed based on preference.
author: Chappll

description: A high-damage hybrid build with simple setup combo's. Capable of playing at all ranges.
author: GrimXv

description: A highly-mobile physical build with great defensives and damage. My build of choice for 1vX.
author: GrimXv

description: A very slippery build which utilises high health & movement combined with occasional damage boosts from bites to achieve unparalleled survivability when roaming Mortium and other areas with high mob density. Due to the limits of formatting Im only able to put shadow set- ideally you play 2 shadow set pieces and 2 dread ones for the extra damage while still capping movement speed with little opportunity cost.
author: Fallen

description: A high-damage magic build overwhelming your opponent with many quick casts. At long range spam bow and polarity shifts in neutral, when it lands usually void on the enemy's feet and force one of their i-frames,then decide to either go in and use the CD advantage or keep bullying at range. In melee abuse the insane dmg and quick cast of polarity shift, bait counters into void. Bastion can be swapped to dark enchantement, especially in OW if you know other players have high damage combo builds. OR to spiritual Infusion for even more glasscanon. Scholar 3 can be replaced with Mutant 2 for rift farming, gives you 30sec ultimate cooldown under optimal use (pretty much dash on cooldown to hit PvE mobs).
author: PetiteFleur

description: A flexible build with high damage and sustain build that relies on playing around your ultimates. With this build you have to know that you will be able to use around 2 or 3 ultimates before the cooldown of your enemy's recovers, to make sure you have it as soon as possible you have to give all the veil attacks you can to reduce the cooldown of your own ult (you will reduce around 7 or 14 seconds with each veil attack). Basically this build will depend on your ultimate to do high burst damage to your opponents, in addition to having survivability thanks to the scholar blood shields and frost spells
author: Goldy

description: A high physical damage build with parry and attackspeed. Can alternatively take blood rage over surge
author: Blub

description: A semi-high physical damage build with parry, attackspeed and insta-freeze.
author: Blub

description: A one shot combo build that uses frost barrier with knockback jewel along with blood bat with stun and damage at tipper to set up huge damage from Freeze > carrion swarm > crimson beam
author: Chappll

description: The new version of fear lance. Can no longer combo from sirens wail E but deals huge damage from raw lances by stacking as many damage sources as possible for spells and ult. Lance > Aegis > Leap > Lance
author: Chappll

description: Proc your own counters with the shadows summoned by corrupted blood.
author: Hotbiscuit

description: A tanky healing build that helps sustain teamates
author: Chappll

description: A tanky physical damage healing build that provides aoe buffs and heals using blood rage
author: Chappll

description: Stacked with high value AOE support spells that will damage enemies while assisting teammates
author: Chappll

description: A higher mobility more offensive variation of arctic storm that maximises its damage using enhanced conductivity to proc static
author: Chappll

description: A high physical damage build with parry and attackspeed. Can alternatively take surge over rage
author: Pancake

description: Bringing the standard physical damage build from 1.0 it still holds up. Can take frost or blood dash. Blood rage or surge. And any counter of your choice.
author: Chappll

description: Deals big cleave damage with wolf bounces along with have a good amount of sustain through wolfs healing jewel. Can take aegis or frost barrier for defensive
author: Chappll

description: Maximises the number of skeletons mages along with minion damage
author: Chappll

description: Classic double summon build. Easy to play but teaches bad habits for pvp
author: Chappll

description: Uses agony skeleton jewel on all unholy spells for its damage, this causes skeletons to not attack and then expload after a short duration. Potential for high burst from ult but the build is unreliable
author: Chappll

description: A standard physical damage set that uses soulburn for melee range pressure and to deal with defensives
author: Chappll

description: Alternative to artic storm scholar tank, soulburn is faster and provides great defence when hitting multiple targets but damage is much lower
author: Chappll

description: Very strong control based neutral game. Exceptional at long ranged combat.
author: Chappll

description: A Physical build stacked high on veil damage together with curse
author: Chappll

description: Uses Draculin blood and spells with multiple charges to have an endless barrage of projectile spells on a very low cooldown. Bat shift is best but can play any combination of projectiles, ideally at least one with multple charges.
author: Chappll

description: To maximise draculin bloods value for lowering cooldowns with crits you can play double offensive spells since no defensive can crit, there are many varients of this that differ massively in viability but bat or polarity are the most typical offensive spell with void, frost nova or ball lightning for your aoe
author: Chappll

description: A more defensive version of unholy chains that does not greed for maximum damage with the longer duration jewel. Chains is a great spell vs newer players but gets much worse vs experienced players that will iframe the end damage or play aggressively to cancel your chain.
author: Chappll

description: Tanky Scholar set with high aoe damage and spell vamp that deals damage with enhanced conductivity static procs
author: Chappll

description: A high-damage, mobile and flexible build with reliable combos. Primarily deals damage from frost bat and chill weave. Freeze > Axe E > Bat > Bat
author: Chappll - Seen from Redd

description: Supportive Scholar Mutant set that deals damage with enhanced conductivity static procs
author: Chappll
content: Raids and Teamfights, weaker at dueling

description: Supportive Scholar Mutant set that deals damage with enhanced conductivity static procs
author: Chappll

description: Supportive Scholar Mutant set that deals damage with ults, arctic Storm and static procs
author: Chappll

description: Chaos volley build using the blood Corrupted. With Corrupted Re-casts benefit + Mist trance you get little down time in weapon abilities, being able to use crossbow/longbow Q often for knockbacks and zoning With Corrupted and the passives you also get max movement speed, which combined to Illusion dash and Mist Trance it gives insane mobility I also use Cold Soul as I use Frost coats + frost weapons, as it helps hitting Volleys as opponents are slowed slightly and  spell damage is increased with the Cold Soul perk
author: roneg

description: A solo weapon build that is great for 1vX and avoiding enemies while doing solid damage and incredible burst potential. Warrior/Corrupted is a high risk variant that can dish out tons of damage and weapon/spell charges, you can use the shades spawned from your blood to hit your enemy or proc your own Mist Trance, you can also use Polarity shift to make your enemy be hit by the ghosts, however if you're in a team situation you can get dog piled, so be cautious. A safer variant would be Rogue/Warrior blood. Alternate Polartiy Shift, Aftershock, Wraith Spear or Curse if you prefer
author: Remortis

description: OD is the zenith of versatility, offering unparalleled dominance across all ranges — short, medium, and long. Mastery of cooldown management is essential. Stoic and unshakable, it punishes any approach: if your opponent engages you, they are dead. If they play long range, they are dead too. Weapon mastery is crucial because there are no defences to rely on. You fight or you fall. As the ultimate physical build, it stands undefeated — practically turning you into gOD.
author: Spineless

description: The Battle Mage build is a relentless hybrid, merging physical power with spell power. It boasts maximum attack speed, high damage reduction, and high movement speed. This setup taps into every skill tree.
author: Spineless

description: A safe and fast roaming build that makes use of the void for high aoe pressure at any range
author: Chappll - Yumeko Build

description: Very strong control based neutral game. Exceptional at long ranged combat. Ward of the damned gives amazing ranged pressure and defence and AOE for beating double defensive. Jewel for Ward is very important - Agony, heal, knockback and recast damage. Can play void or chaos volley
author: Chappll

description: Proc your own counters with the shadows summoned by corrupted blood. Very few opening to deal damage to without AOE. Very strong 1vX and has many good matchups
author: Chappll

description: A higher damage chain setup that has decent neutral and defence. The top tier core of frost barrier, frost dash does a good job setting up chains. Best when taking the dot jewel not and does not greed more damage with extra duration
author: Chappll - Seen from Chipsa

description: Standard physical build with a good spread of tank, damage and mobility stats
author: Chappll - Seen from Nemesis

description: A build that enables daggers as a solo weapon with no weapon swaps. Optimised stats with maxed physical crit, phys power, weapon skill power. Perfect with the artifact weapon wraith blades it aims to stack high phantasm quickly and throw dagger Qs as often as possible.
author: Chappll

description: A safe double defence build with very few openings. The #1 build in gloomrot modernised for this patch, still very good
author: Chappll - Tribute to Swanifier

description: A double defence build that aims to get low cooldown ults to assist teammates
author: Chappll - Dawan Build

description: A double defence build that aims to get low cooldown ults to deal large bursts of damage
author: Chappll - Chipsa Build

description: A build with optimised stats for maxed physical crit, phys power, weapon skill power. Provides a lot of safety with mist trance and aegis while doing its damage with high value weapon skills. Can include wraithblades swaps for huge damage Qs
author: Chappll - Chipsa Build

description: An aggressive physical build for chasing and fast cooldown trading
author: Chappll

description: A more defensive varient of the random ball shift build which is becoming common. Exceptionally strong neutral game, very good at ranged and close combat, highly mobile.
author: Chappll

description: Vulnarable in 1v1s but huge damage potential when protected
author: Chappll

description: Proc your own counters with the shadows summoned by corrupted blood. Very few opening to deal damage to without AOE. Very strong 1vX and has many good matchups. Spell damage varient with very low counter cds
author: Chappll

description: Huge Combo Potential with Freeze > Spider > Lance. Potential to one shot vs squishy bloods
author: Chappll

description: Plays massively around the wisp dance ulty for the majority of its damage with the potential for huge curse hits while it is active
author: ChipSa

description: Takes advantage of Wraith spears high mobility to remain safe and hits hard with its poke when wraith spears lands. Wisp dance can pressure during close range fights
author: Chappll - seen from Immarl

description: Mobile, good damage, strong 1vX and a reasonable matchup into double defence. Can kite well and chaos barrier has great synergy with aftershock together being a high damage defensive that uses the aoe damage of aftershock to counters chaos barriers bad matchups vs defensives
author: Chappll
